body: Ever since he draws the yandere sister story, whenever I saw his drawings of girls, they always gave me a yandere look and feel even though they were not yandere at all.

Gonna mark this for reading. Frankly, the opening scene of seeing her sitting on the swing under rain reminds me of another novel from GA Bunko (Youtube manga adaptation) about gyaru (actually not) who got kicked out of her house after her divorced and abusive mom leave her daughter to be with her own boyfriend. Well, totally different story though. In this one, Yuuri's parents are in bad relationship so she lives with her grandparents. But after they died, her parents sold away the grandparents' house and file a divorce. Well, in the end, Yuuri decided to start living on her own (in small apartment behind her senpai's house).
